EmailTemplate.description: Notification to seller for digital title received
EmailTemplate.name: Notification to Seller for Digital Title Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Processed: Title - {!Case.Vehicle_Year_Make_Model__c} ({!Case.VIN__c})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for submitting your title paperwork to ACV Auctions through our digital title process!
Please note that we have reviewed your paperwork and it has been approved. Payment has been initiated and you will be in receipt of a shipping label within 1-4 business days. Please send the physical title documentation within 2 business days of receiving the shipping label.
We appreciate your partnership during these challenging times. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at 716-796-6976 option 2 or at titles@acvauctions.com (the digital-titles@acvauctions.com inbox is only for title submissions).
Thank you!
ACV Auctions
Titles Team
